Ah, you make a fair point - I forgot about the PvP nature of the request. That raises other issues in itself, of course - essentially building for only one type of foe (mage-killer, priest-wrangler, whatever), and hence being vulnerable to many others. A dexer Monk is probably better suited than most to this, but still won't be at its pinnacle.

Oh, and I know how crappy it sounds, but a Kama build (possibly dual-wield) would still do it better, I reckon.

Essentially, all I'm saying is that Shaklone needs to give us a bit more info as to what they want...
